Itemized Passive Description:
*Activates the Entrance Animation when there is another
"Majin Buu Saga" Category ally on the team upon the
character's entry*
- {passiveImg:once}{passiveImg:forever}Damage reduction rate 90%{passiveImg:up_g}
- {passiveImg:forever}Damage reduction rate 15%{passiveImg:down_r} for every turn passed
(no more than -90%)
- {passiveImg:once}Chance of performing a critical hit 50%{passiveImg:up_g} for 5 turn(s)
*Basic effect(s)*
- Ki +2
- ATK & DEF 150%{passiveImg:up_g}
- Medium chance of performing a critical hit
- Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of
becoming a Super Attack
*When attacking with 12 or more Ki*
- ATK & DEF 150%{passiveImg:up_g}
*For every Super Attack performed*
- {passiveImg:forever}Damage reduction rate 5%{passiveImg:up_g} (up to 30%)
*When there is another "Majin Buu Saga" Category ally
attacking in the same turn*
- DEF 100%{passiveImg:up_g} and guards all attacks as the 1st attacker in a
turn
- ATK 100%{passiveImg:up_g} and launches an additional Super Attack as the
2nd or 3rd attacker in a turn
*When receiving a Ki Blast Super Attack*
- High chance of nullifying it and countering with tremendous
power

5529.superDescription:
Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn and 
causes immense damage with 
a high chance of stunning the enemy

Active Skill.Name: Full Power Kamehameha
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Massively raises ATK temporarily, 
causes ultimate damage to enemy and, 
within the turn activated, 
all attacks become critical hits
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when there is another 
"Majin Buu Saga" Category ally attacking 
in the same turn starting from the 4th turn 
from the start of battle (once only)
